entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 a.m. ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
